      • hasDefaultRoute

        public boolean hasDefaultRoute()
        Returns:
        true if this routing table has a default route, else false

      • addDefaultGateway

        public Route addDefaultGateway(IPAddress gateway,
                      Interface intface)
                        throws Exception
        Add a default rule to the routing table (route at the end that match all ip addresses)
        Parameters:
        gateway - the gateway of this default rule
        intface - the interface of the default rule
        Returns:
        the added rule
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getNextHop

        public IPAddress getNextHop(IPAddress ip)

        Parameters:
        ip - the destination ip address
        Returns:

        Exception
